name: Matryoshka Mayhem (UpRoomGames)
description:
Description

A short and entertaining puzzle game made for the GMTK Jam 2021 - Theme: "Joined together." Play as one (or more) red matryoshkas and try to gobble up all the blue matryoshkas on each level to progress. The opposing matryoshkas will mirror your inputs and when a larger matryoshka collides with a smaller one it gobbles it up, growing in size. Will you become the most massive matryoshka?

Credits

Programming + Design: UpRoom Games

Pixel Art by: Bruno Chiovoloni

Music by: Noa Beazley

Sound Design: RyanDS

Assets Used:

Free Pixel Font - Thaleah
